title: Can you create music even if you can't sing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure. Though it helps to sing, many people create music without being a singer. Having said that: everybody CAN sing. Not everyone might be a great lead vocalist, but we all can sing. So singing for yourself along with the piano or guitar is a great way to come up with good melodies. Listen to old jazz recordings and you'll recognize, how many instrumentalists actually sing along during a solo. They might not be great singers, but that's not what it's about. So create awesome music even if you don't sing. And rest assured that you are able to sing :).

I seem to remember being told that Beethoven was not much of a singer, even when he did have his hearing. Now imagine yourself producing the same quality of music without the ability to sing or even hear it if you could. Arguably, one of the greatest composers ever wrote much of his output while being deaf as a post. So the answer is yes, it is possible but takes talent and hard work — just the same for some who can sing.

Of course! Music itself is such a broad spectrum of creativity that literally anything that generates audible noise can be turned into music. It helps to have knowledge of music theory and certain instruements to make creating more formal music easier, but you don't have to follow the rules of music. Even in the modern day of auto tune, people who can't sing are able to sing. So literally anything is possible as music technology and creativity move forward.

Yes. There are a lot of musicians that have created music almost exclusively by playing instruments or “making beats” (Miles Davis & Herb Alpert on the Trumpet, John Coltrane & Kenny G on the Saxophone, Andre Watts & Ramsey Lewis on the Piano, David Foster & Ben Tankard on Keyboards & other instruments, just to name a few).

Of course! Music is a language, it doesnt mean you have to speak it one way. Many, many high level producers and songwriters cannot actually sing themselves, but sinply understand how to communicate musical language to those with a following or voice.

Yes! Learn an instrument, rap, write song lyrics, use auto tune or a vocoder. Produce music electronically via programs like Fruity loops studio. Make music with the Native instruments maschine. It is a workstation that allows you to produce.
Having a sense of music is the primary requisite for a composer. Singers are the medium through which a composer expresses his/her art. So its not mandatory for a music producer to be good at vocals.
